```{r echo  = FALSE, warn = FALSE, message = FALSE}
d <- dat %>%
  filter(player == player_of_interest)

hist_plot <- d %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = performance)) +
  geom_histogram()

## Turn ggplot into a plotly
hist_plot %>%
  ggplotly()
  
```
